title: 2022 Porsche 911 Carrera 4S Coupe
description: This 2022 Porsche 911 Carrera 4S coupe was initially sold in California and has remained registered in the state, and it has traveled 12k miles. The car is powered by a twin-turbocharged 3.0L flat-six that drives all four wheels through an eight-speed PDK dual-clutch automatic transaxle, and it is finished in GT Silver Metallic over Bordeaux Red leather. Features include the Sport Chrono Package, LED headlights, Porsche Active Suspension Management (PASM), 20" and 21" RS Spyder Design wheels, heated and ventilated front sport seats, a Burmester sound system, cruise control, dual-zone automatic climate control, a surround-view camera system, and Porsche Communication Management with navigation. This 992.1 4S coupe is now offered on dealer consignment with the owner's manual, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a 2022 Porsche 911 Carrera 4S Coupe at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #188,952.
text: This 2022 Porsche 911 Carrera 4S coupe was initially sold in California and has remained registered in the state, and it has traveled 12k miles. The car is powered by a twin-turbocharged 3.0L flat-six that drives all four wheels through an eight-speed PDK dual-clutch automatic transaxle, and it is finished in GT Silver Metallic over Bordeaux Red leather. Features include the Sport Chrono Package, LED headlights, Porsche Active Suspension Management (PASM), 20″ and 21″ RS Spyder Design wheels, heated and ventilated front sport seats, a Burmester sound system, cruise control, dual-zone automatic climate control, a surround-view camera system, and Porsche Communication Management with navigation. This 992.1 4S coupe is now offered on dealer consignment with the owner’s manual, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title. The car is finished in GT Silver Metallic (M7Z), and exterior equipment includes a sunroof, LED headlights, fog lights, a speed-activated rear spoiler, and front and rear parking sensors. The rear spoiler was repaired in January 2024. The 20″ and 21″ RS Spyder Design wheels are mounted with Pirelli P Zero tires. Two tires were replaced in November 2023. Standard equipment on the Carrera 4S includes a Porsche Active Suspension Management (PASM) that features a 10mm lower ride height. Braking is handled by red-finished Porsche-script calipers over cross-drilled and ventilated rotors. The heated and ventilated power-adjustable front sport seats feature Porsche-crest headrests and are trimmed in Bordeaux Red leather. Cabin amenities include a Burmester sound system, cruise control, dual-zone automatic climate control, a surround-view camera system, and Porsche Communication Management with navigation. The leather-wrapped multifunction steering wheel features paddle shifters and a drive-mode dial, and it fronts a central 8k-rpm tachometer with an inset speed readout that is flanked by twin LCD screens with configurable displays. A Sport Chrono stopwatch is mounted atop the center of the dash. The digital odometer indicates 12k miles. The twin-turbocharged 3.0L flat-six was factory-rated at 443 horsepower and 390 lb-ft of torque. Power is routed to all four wheels through an eight-speed PDK dual-clutch automatic transaxle. html:
This 2022 Porsche 911 Carrera 4S coupe was initially sold in California and has remained registered in the state, and it has traveled 12k miles. The car is powered by a twin-turbocharged 3.0L flat-six that drives all four wheels through an eight-speed PDK dual-clutch automatic transaxle, and it is finished in GT Silver Metallic over Bordeaux Red leather. Features include the Sport Chrono Package, LED headlights, Porsche Active Suspension Management (PASM), 20″ and 21″ RS Spyder Design wheels, heated and ventilated front sport seats, a Burmester sound system, cruise control, dual-zone automatic climate control, a surround-view camera system, and Porsche Communication Management with navigation. This 992.1 4S coupe is now offered on dealer consignment with the owner’s manual, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title.

The car is finished in GT Silver Metallic (M7Z), and exterior equipment includes a sunroof, LED headlights, fog lights, a speed-activated rear spoiler, and front and rear parking sensors. The rear spoiler was repaired in January 2024.

The 20″ and 21″ RS Spyder Design wheels are mounted with Pirelli P Zero tires. Two tires were replaced in November 2023. Standard equipment on the Carrera 4S includes a Porsche Active Suspension Management (PASM) that features a 10mm lower ride height. Braking is handled by red-finished Porsche-script calipers over cross-drilled and ventilated rotors.

The heated and ventilated power-adjustable front sport seats feature Porsche-crest headrests and are trimmed in Bordeaux Red leather. Cabin amenities include a Burmester sound system, cruise control, dual-zone automatic climate control, a surround-view camera system, and Porsche Communication Management with navigation.

The leather-wrapped multifunction steering wheel features paddle shifters and a drive-mode dial, and it fronts a central 8k-rpm tachometer with an inset speed readout that is flanked by twin LCD screens with configurable displays. A Sport Chrono stopwatch is mounted atop the center of the dash. The digital odometer indicates 12k miles.

The twin-turbocharged 3.0L flat-six was factory-rated at 443 horsepower and 390 lb-ft of torque.

Power is routed to all four wheels through an eight-speed PDK dual-clutch automatic transaxle.

The Carfax report is free of accidents or other damage.
